name: Retro Arcade Adventure Remade
description:
Retro styled Hack and Slash action with a fire breathing variety of Power Ups and huge bosses.

  • A one screen hack and slash arcade type game.
  • You are running around on one screen and hack your way through waves of enemies.
  • Power Ups will help you, e.g. you can transform into a giant dragon and breath fire all over the place.
IMPORTANT

This is the final version of the game without all the frustrating issues from the original release:

  • No waves of 100 or more enemies, anymore!
  • No Bosses with more HP than years on the calendar anymore!
  • Just quick, plain retro fun!

If you already own a copy of Retro Arcade Adventure Remade, please contact me so I can make sure you get this new one(info@siactro.com).
